class.name: LuaThread
class.brief_description: An object that represents a thread of execution in the Lua virtual machine.
class.description: The LuaThread class represents a thread of execution in the Lua virtual machine. Apart from [member LuaState.main_thread], all other threads of execution are [LuaCoroutine]s.

method.name: is_main_thread
method.description: Whether this thread is the [LuaState]'s main thread. See also [member LuaState.main_thread].

members.member: The current status of the thread.

constants.constant: A runtime error occurred in the thread.
A syntax error occurred in the thread.
A memory allocation error occurred in the thread.
An error occurred while running the error handler.
